short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension displays your daily Github contributions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Track your GitHub contributions in your browser!

Set personal goals for your daily or weekly contributions and get coding.

This extension adds a circle to chrome that will show the number of your contributions and change color to a darker green as you reach a high level for that day.  So if your circle is dark green then you've had high level of contributions for the day.

If you click on the circle a popup will expand and show your contributions for the week and the year with the normal GitHub contribution chart.
